item.title: Where do I put this?
item.dc:creator: @11130 ²
item.description:
@11130 wrote:

[code]String playerTitle = “”;
if(playerRights == 3)
playerTitle = “[OWNER]”;
if(playerRights == 2)
playerTitle = “[ADMINISTRATOR]”;
if(playerRights == 1)
playerTitle = “[MODERATOR]”;

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerTitle+""+playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
}
}[/code]

Where can I put that in client.java to give me no errors?
